t: Jacobson Hat Company - Home
s: Jacobson Hat Company is the best kept secret behind many of the world’s top hat resellers. Since 1930, we have produced nearly 100 million hats while generating close to $1 billion in revenue for both mom & pop stores as well as legacy retailers.

t: Jacobson Hat Company - Crunchbase Company Profile & Funding
s: Jacobson Hat Company is the hat reseller. They create about 100 million hats for mom-and-pop shops as well as for businesses. They offer fashion headwear trends, the latest graphic designs, and custom lettering styles in addition to novelty, souvenir, costume, and party hats and accessories.
